trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Madison
There were no other sightings in Madison on or around May 5th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsabout 11:50pm this evening 5 5 2011 - i saw something in the sky that I cannot explain the location of the object was over lake mendota in madison wi - around the blackhawk country club location. The object was probably about 2-3 miles from me I live off of Univ Ave in madison wi-- I noticed a bright light in the distance that looked like it was changing colors - I got out my binoculars and watched for some time - there were yellow, green and red pulsating lights - i could not tell if what the shape of the object was i do not think it was a square or rectangle it might have been a circle - i am not sure. i was very excited to see the lights and wondered what it was i watched for about 10 minutes...to see if i could see movement or sound, i did not hear any sound also the object seemed to get lower in the sky - so i left to see it in my car - i could not find so i came back home and looked for it again and it was gone
